Comments

Comments are simply pieces of text that can be ignored during the compilation process. Anything in a comment will not affect the functionality of the code. This is what a single line comment looks like: 

// this is a single line comment

Here is what a multiline comment looks like: 

/*
* multi line comment
*/

And here is what a docstring comment looks like: 

/**
* This is a docstring.
*
* @param a - this is a param called a
*/
const someFunc = (str a) -> str {
    return a
}
